title: 06/17/2021 - HOUR 3 - Clippers & 76ers and B.J Armstrong
itunes:title: 06/17/2021 - HOUR 3 - Clippers & 76ers and B.J Armstrong
description:
In hour 3, Colin recaps the Clippers historic game 5 against Utah. The 76ers epic meltdown against the Atlanta Hawks. BJ Armstrong joins the show to talks scouting players in the league, Luka Doncic's unhappiness and more.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
